categories: Category:Commission for the Preservation of the New Order organizations

nodes.text: The Select Committee was a secret entity that guided the five major organizations of COMPNOR, which were the Imperial Security Bureau, the Sub-Adult Group, the Coalition for Progress, the Coalition for Improvements, and CompForce. Orders from the Select Committee filtered through the organization despite its structure and membership being unknown. It was rumored that the Select Committee had between a few hundred members, to several thousand, but the Committee had never confirmed or specified details.
